metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11499 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in handle_error() in sass_context.cpp in LibSass 3.4.x and 3.5.x through 3.5.4 that could be leveraged to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
